last_episode_to_air.name: I Would Gift You the Sky
last_episode_to_air.overview: As graduation approaches, Miyamura reflects on the past year, an uncertain future, and the new life he’s found.

name: Horimiya
overview: A secret life is the one thing they have in common. At school, Hori is a prim and perfect social butterfly, but the truth is she's a brash homebody. Meanwhile, under a gloomy facade, Miyamura hides a gentle heart, along with piercings and tattoos. In a chance meeting, they both reveal a side they've never shown. Could this blossom into something new?

episodes.name: A Tiny Happenstance
episodes.overview: Hori-san lives a double life: trendy, popular girl at school, simple, strong-willed caretaker at home. After a chance encounter with her classmate Miyamura, she finds out that she’s not the only one who hides her true self away.

episodes.name: You Wear More Than One Face
episodes.overview: When her mother asks about Miyamura, Hori comes to a frightening realization. Later, the Student Council ropes Hori into extra work, but when conflict arises, it's up to Miyamura to smooth things over.

episodes.name: That's Why It's Okay
episodes.overview: Miyamura reflects on his past and present. Hori responds to Remi's selfish demand. A heated conversation between Ishikawa and Miyamura ends with a fistfight.

episodes.name: Everybody Loves Somebody
episodes.overview: The student council room becomes a cool hangout. Hori tries to get Miyamura flustered. An old friend brings out a new side of Miyamura. Later, when Hori gets sick, Miyamura comes to her rescue.

episodes.name: I Can't Say It Out Loud
episodes.overview: A rumor complicates Hori and Miyamura's budding relationship. Kyosuke comes home to roost and instantly takes a liking to Miyamura. Sakura evaluates her friendship with Remi.

episodes.name: This Summer's Going to Be a Hot One
episodes.overview: Miyamura ends up staying the night. Rumors spread like wildfire at school. Shindo calls the couple over to share a bag of candy. A second-year girl begins to stalk Miyamura.

episodes.name: You're Here, I'm Here
episodes.overview: Sakura finds the courage to get closer to Toru. Yoshikawa struggles to voice what she truly wants. Miyamura goes away for a week-long trip. Hori worries about her horror obsession.

episodes.name: The Truth Deception Reveals
episodes.overview: Remi reflects on how she and Sengoku started dating. Miyamura discovers a hidden side of Hori. When Yoshikawa gets asked out, the gang gets Ishikawa to help.

episodes.name: It's Hard, but Not Impossible
episodes.overview: Miyamura runs into some unfriendly faces. Hori tries to get Miyamura to fulfill her darkest desires. Mizouchi's love is unrequited. Tanihara confronts his past with Miyamura.

episodes.name: Until the Snow Melts
episodes.overview: Hori has an unexpected demand of Miyamura. When Yoshikawa learns her fake relationship with Ishikawa might be coming to an end, she's forced to reflect on her own feelings.

episodes.name: It May Seem Like Hate
episodes.overview: The gang tries to get Yanagi to loosen up. Iura is clueless as to how much he terrifies Sawada. When Iura’s sister Motoko is struggling with entrance exams, Iura asks Hori to help.

episodes.name: Hitherto, and Forevermore
episodes.overview: Yoshikawa heads over to Ishikawa's house. Christmas brings romantic holiday cheer to all. Hori and Miyamura discuss their future.

episodes.name: I Would Gift You the Sky
episodes.overview: As graduation approaches, Miyamura reflects on the past year, an uncertain future, and the new life he’s found.
